assistant.content: Additionally, you consistently practice meditation with light music every night before bed, which has significantly improved the results. Perhaps further optimizing your meditation practice could help consolidate the sleep improvements.

user.content: Well, I also think we should continue to persist with meditation. But regarding the issue with the eyes, do you have any suggestions?

assistant.content: Schedule brief "screen breaks" daily and adopt the 20-20-20 rule to alleviate eye strain: every 20 minutes of screen time, look at something 20 feet away for at least 20 seconds. This method is simple, practical, and won't disrupt your routine.

assistant.content: Great! I believe persisting with this will be very beneficial for your health.
